Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Psychic

Standard

Reach 2

+18 vs AC; 1d10+3 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+18 vs AC; 2d6+3 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Psychic

Standard

Close blast 10

+17 vs Fortitude; 2d8+7 psychic damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage and is dazed (save ends both). Each time the target fails the saving throw against this effect, the purple dragon can slide it 3 squares. Miss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed and does not take ongoing damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Psychic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

At-Will âœ¦ Charm, Gaze

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

Targets a stunned or dazed creature; +17 vs Will; the target is dominated until the end of the dragon's next turn. The purple dragon can use dominating gaze on only one creature at a time.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +17 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Recharge 3-6

Minor

The dragon gains the phasing quality until the end of its turn.
An adult purple dragon that begins its turn in direct sunlight can take only a single standard action on its turn. If it ends the turn in direct sunlight, it also takes 160 damage.
